price: (50) They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
